item.title: Jon Stewart Taking Over ‘Daily Show’ Desk Tonight After Jimmy Kimmel Suspension
item.description: ‘The Daily Show’ icon is taking over Thursday’s episode in the wake of ‘Jimmy Kimmel Live!’ being pulled.
